response.overview: Comments on the problems of living in a city environment with the sad story of the mistreatment of a tree which is struggling to live on a city street. For elementary grades.  A graphic presentation of a bedraggled city tree, who tells, inverse, in a self-pitying but endearing manner, how difficult life is to a tree surrounded by concrete. Points up the carelessness, ignorance and indifference of pedestrians and motorists in the treeâ€™s struggle to stay alive. Wry comments on the urban ecology make this one for all ages to view.  16mm
response.title: City Tree
